_sText:
Spawns 30. 24 Cts, 6 Ts. In this map, there are 6 layers 
and a giant ladder connecting all of them in the center. 
In each layer, there is 1 terrorist that 
spawns inside the room and 4 counter-terrorists that 
spawn on 4 different sides outside of the room. The trick 
is, the terrorists get a machine gun, smoke grenade, 
flash grenade, and he grenade, while counter-terrorists 
have to take out the T's with only knives and pistols. T's, defend your 
room or climb up or down the ladder to help another T. 
Ct's, eliminate the terrorist using skills and tactics and then go 
to the other layers to kill all the other T's to win the 
game. Small map, fun for 10-20 mins.
